title: Winnie the Pooh
description: This children's frieze illustrates chapter eight, "Christopher Robin Leads an Expotition to the North Pole" from "Winnie the Pooh", by A.A. Milne, 1926. The frieze incorporates the original book illustrations by E.H Shephard which have been made continuous by the addition of an idyllic landscape.
name: Frieze
